entry.title: My Beloved Ghost and Me.
entry.summary:
Author: daggerandrosie

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 118,868Chapters: 18/18Kudos: 55

Summary: “Listen Buckley, I need you to know that this whole…” The officer gestured to his' clothes. “Gothics United Against Following Curfew club you're a part of can end up real bad, you can die kid. Or worse, go to jail.”Buck doesn't think he looks much like a goth, aside from wearing black, and he only does it because it's easier to sneak around like that, there's nothing about him… Scratch that. Officer Gallagher just found him lurking around the cemetery at two in the morning. Because he talks to ghosts.Always have and probably always will.It fucking sucks.It sucks. so. bad.And now he has one. A ghost. In his room. A very handsome one at that, an old cowboy with a cowboy hat, tight pants, boots and big brown eyes.Buck is so, so, very fucked

entry.title: In Bloom
entry.summary:
Author: PurplePanda12

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,799Chapters: 3/5Kudos: 3

Summary: Eddie is sure of two things. First, Buck is his soul mate; his scarred seed has been telling him ever since he got to LA (he just wasn’t listening), which means he is definitely into guys. What’s the word? Gay? Yeah, he is. Second, and surprisingly (or not) the one he’s acknowledged so easily and wholeheartedly, is that he is in love with Buck. Eddie can be cool and happy about these realizations, there is one hurdle though (and perhaps the worst part of it all) Buck happens to be dating a guy Eddie would definitely not be interested in. A man, Buck, his best friend (and soulmate), confuses being “his” own soulmate because the guy’s soul mark happens to be a fucking gardening tool!

entry.title: Blue Pink White Pink Blue
entry.summary:
Author: Warlock_Nerd

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,332Chapters: 23/23Kudos: 460

Summary: Bobby noticed him first and went up to him. "Can I help you, young man?"The teenager shuffled forward. "I'm looking for Edmundo, Edmundo Diaz? He works here."Hearing his name, Eddie's brow furrowed. He stepped closer. At first, he didn't recognize the face. The sharp shape of the jaw, the curve of the mouth… then it clicked."Rachel?" He called, a question laced with surprise.The teenager straightened, "I go by Raphael now."***Eddie gets an unexpected visitor one day on shift, it’s his little cousin who needs a place to stay after getting kicked out by his parents :3 Just so everything is clear. This happens in an alternate universe where season 8 happened a lot differently. Bobby is alive and well, Eddie and Chris never went to Texas, the whole Kim Marisol thing never happened and Buck lives with Eddie due to the loft disappearing or something. (Shh. Don’t read too much into it.)Chris is 14.Enjoy :3

entry.title: Even At My Worst, I'm Best With You
entry.summary:
Author: digitalflute

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,371Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 59

Summary: Eddie is in love with his best friend.But not in, like, a romantic way. Because Eddie is straight. He used to be married to Shannon. He has a son. He’s had sex with women, and he usually enjoyed it. Was it ever the crazy, mind-blowing experience he’s heard other people describe? No. But he’s pretty sure those people are exaggerating anyway.The point is, what he feels for Buck is completely different from anything he felt for Shannon or Ana or Marisol. And if what he felt for them was romantic, that obviously means his feelings for Buck are platonic. It’s just an added bonus that Buck is nice to look at, with his broad shoulders and brawny arms and eyes that sparkle when he smiles. Buck is still living on Eddie’s couch, and it’s been great — really great. But Buck is still talking about moving out, and he can’t let that happen. If there’s a limit to what he’ll do to keep Buck under his roof, Eddie hasn’t found it yet.OR5 Times Eddie Helped Buck + 1 Time He Didn’t

entry.title: Baby, I'm Dancing in the Dark
entry.summary:
Author: Alastair_alastair

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,594Chapters: 5/9Kudos: 99

Summary: TK loved these outings with the team. He loved it since the first time they all went to the honky tonk together after one of the first shifts the 126 ever did after the restoration. It was even better now that they were so close they were family and spending time together was as easy as breathing. It certainly helps having an incredible husband to dance with now, too.TK feels like he barely ever sees him anymore. He comes home late, he leaves early, barely drops by at the firehouse to visit. They don’t talk, they don’t go on dates, there is little to no affection given. The distance is growing by the day and he can’t stand it.But he promised he’d be here tonight. And TK will latch on to the little time they get to spend together like a starved man.----------------Or Carlos is becoming distant due to throwing himself into his work and TK misses his husband. Carlos is scared his new colleagues are homophobic and keeps his marriage a secret. Hurt husband and overprotective family occurs.Or 7 times someone else has asked TK to dance and 1 time Carlos finally did

entry.title: Notifications & Noticing Vacations
entry.summary:
Author: eliopiled

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,503Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 69

Summary: At first, it was the little things, like how Buck always sat facing the door, and how he was quick on his feet, even in situations where danger wasn't relevant. Eddie noticed how Buck never carries anything with his right hand, and how he was very protective of his privacy. He noticed how Buck would always reach for his right ankle or his left hip when danger was afoot. He noticed how Buck never flinched at loud noises. He noticed how Buck would get a call every couple days and walk out to his Jeep to take this "Very Important & Secretive Call".He realized how Buck would disappear during the last weekend of every month, to "Visit Family", and for the past two summers that Eddie's worked at the station, Buck leaves for two weeks every June.Eddie noticed the notifications and the frequent vacations.——Buck is a Navy SEAL Reserve, and Eddie is noticing some things.

entry.title: Unscripted moment After The Tommy and Buck Breakup.
entry.summary:
Author: Villayuly1987

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,610Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 19

Summary: After finding out Tommy manipulated him into leaving the 118, Buck confronts him at the firehouse. The fight turns ugly fast—Tommy admits to using Eddie and Christopher’s names to push Buck into cutting ties with his old life. He reveals he never truly loved Buck, only wanted control. Buck realizes Tommy never cared about him, only about possession.After months of emotional distance and recovery from a toxic relationship with Tommy, Buck has been living with Eddie at his penthouse, slowly healing and reconnecting with his chosen family. A turning point comes when Buck finds an unsent letter from Eddie—dated the day Buck moved in with Tommy—revealing how much Eddie and the 118 tried to reach him,How Eddie punched Tommy and ended up in jail over it.Months laterBuck and Eddie finally share a passionate but tender kiss—drunk on love and history—but Eddie gently holds the line, knowing Buck still needs to heal.

entry.title: just a little bit of your heart (is all I'm asking for)
entry.summary:
Author: dbolterstar

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 232,286Chapters: 25/42Kudos: 251

Summary: “Does this change a thing between us?” Buck asks, his voice low, his hands still framing Eddie’s face. He can feel the unsteady breaths leaving Eddie’s lips, warm against his own. Eddie looks wrecked. His cheeks are flushed, lips red and kiss-swollen, his glassy eyes locked on Buck’s mouth like it’s the only thing he can see. He looks as hungry as Buck feels. Buck feels Eddie’s fingers trace along his arms, squeezing just enough to leave his skin tingling. “I don’t know.” It’s not a yes—Buck’s not even sure he wants to hear a yes. But it’s so much better than the rejection Eddie threw at him before. “Alright,” Buck exhales, nodding like it’s nothing, even though it feels massive. Then he surges forward, catching Eddie’s mouth in his again. The soft, desperate sound Eddie lets out—like relief and need tangled together—hits Buck like a punch to the chest. or; Eddie’s shame torments him. Buck would rather have a piece of Eddie than nothing at all. Miscommunication is their biggest enemy. Infidelity turns into their savior… or ends up being the thing that destroys them?

entry.title: Embers Between Us
entry.summary:
Author: Madforyou

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 57,147Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 373

Summary: The picture on the back is a dark tree line contrasted by the wide blue sky above it. ‘GEORGIA’ is written in big white letters across the top, the bottom saying “Welcome to Adventure.” It’s faded, like it has taken one too many trips in the back of a mail truck, tattered and worn.Eddie flips it over, the back scrawled with quick but somewhat neat handwriting—something personal. Scanning the words his eyes drop to the corner—the address.‘Maddie Kendall, 1500 Hemlock Ave, Hershey, PA 17033’What the hell?Or,An AU where Buck's postcards, which he sent to Maddie, were forwarded to Eddie on deployment by mistake through a Military Outreach Program. They become a reason for Eddie to hold on through the dark times, becoming attached to the man behind the letters and his stories of his travels. Until, by a twist of fate, they bring him face to face with Buck himself.This AU is canon divergent. Some things change but some stay the same.

entry.title: Between his hands - Part. 2 - Obsession
entry.summary:
Author: 911_by_Jane

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,691Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 35

Summary: Buck thought he'd found his place, but with Eddie, nothing is ever simple...From the very beginning of their relationship, Buck is swept away by the burning intensity Eddie offers him. Dominant, mysterious, and sometimes disconcerting, the businessman will stop at nothing to break down his defenses.Took to a secluded villa on the coast, Buck discovers a world of desire and trust where every boundary is redefined. But once their bodies have calmed down, doubts creep in. What does Eddie really want from him?When the past resurfaces in the form of Shannon, Christopher's unstable mother, the fragile balance they were trying to build falters. Between hurtful silences and shattering revelations, Buck will have to choose: run away again... or face his obsession.I'm not very good to English, so please forgive any mistakes I didn't spot (there may be a lot.)
